title: Eton Mess
method: Step 1: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
Step 2: Break meringue cookies into bite-sized chunks and add to whipped cream; fold in berries lightly with a metal spoon until you see streaks of dark pink but still retain some chunks of meringue.
Step 3: Spoon Eton mess into four glass dishes and serve.
